attributes.action: re-introduce capital punishment and corporal punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Its about time we started hanging murderers and pedophiles,gave 20yrs hard labour to anyone in possesion of a gun regardless of their age(no time off either)and gave back the right of the teacher and the policeman to give an errant child a good clip round the ear or six of the best

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
